TEXT: Mandarina channels raw, untamed energy... NL For he is Master of the volatile elements.
A fierce roar echoes, energy crackles, and the heart trembles at The Volatile's command.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~wandering~ ~spirit,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~chaos~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
